content.p: How to gain access other corporate applications. BlueCastle - is the online system whereby assessment results are electronically made available to students BPM - Business Process Management is a process and workflow tool which hosts live University processes that need a clear audit trail and authority points Cognos BI - Provides data to to support strategy, planning and performance Workspace - Workspace is the University's Collaborative platform (pre SharePoint) helping you to share news, information and documentation. Request support to access any other University supported systems or services Free at point of use If you're struggling please get in touch with the team Submit and track requests to solve your IT issues Updates on the University's core IT services
